## Appendix

### Definitions

- **SLA Compliance**: Percentage of bugs resolved within target time
- **Resolution Time**: Time from bug creation to closure
- **Regression Rate**: Percentage of fixes that introduced new bugs
- **Bug Escape Rate**: Bugs found in production vs. found in testing

### Data Sources

- GitHub Issues API
- Sentry Error Tracking
- Manual tracking spreadsheet
